content.question: Which of the following developments in the period 1450–1750 is best understood as a response to the trends shown in the table?

choices.label: The creation of divine-right theories of monarchy
The creation of larger state bureaucracies
The emergence of tribute collection as a form of taxation

content.answer: The creation of larger state bureaucracies
